name: The Dragon Prince
plot: An extraordinary discovery inspires two human princes and an elven assassin to team up on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

episodes.plot: As the human kingdom of Katolis braces for an attack by Moonshadow elves, King Harrow makes plans to send sons Callum and Ezran away to a safe place.
episodes.title: Echoes of Thunder

episodes.plot: Determined to make up for her mistake, Rayla sneaks into the castle and corners Callum. Lord Viren offers the king a way to survive the attack.
episodes.title: What is Done

episodes.plot: With night falling, Rayla and the princes race to share what they've found and stop the attack. But first they'll have to get past Claudia.
episodes.title: Moonrise

episodes.plot: Excited about his newfound powers, Callum convinces the others to travel to the Banther Lodge for a magic cube. Katolis prepares to crown a new king.
episodes.title: Bloodthirsty

episodes.plot: Callum struggles to control his magic, General Amaya clashes with Lord Viren, and a trip down the river takes a hair-raising turn.
episodes.title: An Empty Throne

episodes.plot: After a run-in with a soldier, Rayla leads the princes to high ground. Viren gives Soren and Claudia secret orders as they set out on their mission.
episodes.title: Through the Ice

episodes.plot: In a nearby village, Callum and Ezran seek help for the egg while Rayla hunts down a magic blade. Claudia collects ingredients for a tracking spell.
episodes.title: The Dagger and the Wolf

episodes.plot: Ellis leads the friends to the Cursed Caldera but warns it's crawling with nasty monsters. Viren tries to force Runaan to talk.
episodes.title: Cursed Caldera

episodes.plot: Ezran, Callum and Rayla each put their special talents to use as they make their way up the mountain in a desperate bid to save the egg.
episodes.title: Wonderstorm

episodes.plot: Before marching on toward Xadia, Callum begs Lujanne for a magic lesson, and Ezran tries to teach the dragon prince to fly. But danger is closing in.
episodes.title: A Secret and a Spark

episodes.plot: After a fierce showdown with Rayla, Soren and Claudia argue about the best way to deal with the princes. Rayla worries she's kept a secret too long.
episodes.title: Half Moon Lies

episodes.plot: Callum searches for a way to tell Ezran the sad news, and Rayla sets a trap for Claudia and Soren. Viren watches a mysterious figure in the mirror.
episodes.title: Smoke and Mirrors

episodes.plot: After saying goodbye to Phoe-Phoe, the gang teams up with a pirate to cross a bay, where Callum tries to forge a connection with the sky arcanum.
episodes.title: Voyage of the Ruthless

episodes.plot: At the summit of the five kingdoms, Viren fights to win the support of a young queen. Flashbacks reveal a key moment from King Harrow's reign.
episodes.title: Breaking the Seal

episodes.plot: The attack on the Magma Titan has devastating consequences for two kingdoms. In his letter, Harrow shares a lie, a secret and a wish for the princes.
episodes.title: Heart of a Titan

episodes.plot: When Soren picks a fight with a dragon, chaos breaks out -- and Rayla faces a difficult decision. A defeated Viren returns to the figure in the mirror.
episodes.title: Fire and Fury

episodes.plot: Callum pays a price for dabbling in dark magic. Claudia searches desperately for a way to help Soren, and Ezran makes a heartbreaking discovery.
episodes.title: The Book of Destiny

episodes.plot: After using his gift to help Claudia, Ezran makes an important decision about the quest. Callum wakes up with a new understanding of primal magic.
episodes.title: Breathe

episodes.plot: To cross into Xadia, Rayla and Callum must find a way past a fearsome dragon who was blinded in a battle with a human.
episodes.title: Sol Regem

episodes.plot: At his first High Council meeting, King Ezran faces a flurry of difficult decisions. Rayla guides Callum through a wonderland of magical creatures.
episodes.title: The Crown

episodes.plot: Rayla returns home to an alarming discovery, the Sunfire elves decide Amaya's fate, and Claudia confronts her father.
episodes.title: Ghost

episodes.plot: A mysterious stranger offers Rayla, Callum and Zym a ride across the Midnight Desert. With Katolis in danger, Ezran makes a startling announcement.
episodes.title: The Midnight Desert

episodes.plot: Rayla and Callum race across the desert to find Nyx. As Katolis prepares for war, Ezran gets help from an unlikely source.
episodes.title: Heroes and Masterminds

episodes.plot: On the march to Xadia, Viren reveals how Avizandum, the Dragon King, met his end. Phoe-Phoe takes Ezran on an epic journey.
episodes.title: Thunderfall

episodes.plot: As Team Zym begins the steep climb up to the Dragon Queen's lair, Viren and Aaravos play a nasty trick on the Sunfire elves.
episodes.title: Hearts of Cinder

episodes.plot: With Viren's glowing army closing in on the Storm Spire, Rayla, Callum and friends must decide whether to flee to safety or stay and fight.
episodes.title: Dragonguard

episodes.plot: Determined to save the Dragon Prince at any cost, the friends brace for a fiery showdown with Viren -- who still has a few surprises up his sleeve.
episodes.title: The Final Battle
